ack.p: We are very grateful to Dr. Pavel Klimov (University of Michigan) for confirming that Chaetodactylus krombeini used in this study was correctly identified. The study was supported by the USDA National Institute of Food & Agriculture (NIFA) Grant (NIFA Award: 2014-67004-21631). We acknowledge the World Climate Research Programme's Working Group on Coupled Modelling, which is responsible for CMIP, and we thank the climate modeling groups, especially the CESM groups, for producing and making available their model output. For CMIP the United States Department of Energy's Program for Climate Model Diagnosis and Intercomparison provides coordinating support and led development of software infrastructure in partnership with the Global Organization for Earth System Science Portals.
